fileIOPackage

Class ImagesIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fileIOPackage.ImagesIO

  • public class ImagesIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class contains static methods to manipulate the images files (add and delete) that are browsed by the user
    Version:
    03/12/2016
    Author:
    Yahya Almardeny

      static boolean addImage(Subjects subject)
      Static method that transfers an image from a source which the user chose via a FileDialog to specific directory according to the subject passed as a parameter

      delete the last image file from its directory
